summary: Alternate style Ebony Boots, modders resource.
descriptionHtml:
I like many people love the ebony armor but i was never quite fond of how the boots were shaped so i loaded them up into my program and tweaked the shape a little bit. All the original texturing IS INTACT.

For the most part they are ready to go as is, however they **WILL BE REQUIRED** to be loaded into Nif scope (or whatever program you use) and be given the proper bones to be usable in game. Unfortunately i don't quite know how to work nif scope so i am releasing this as a modders resource until i can sit down and learn the program.

These boots were made by modifying the male version of the boots, if you are looking for a female set of boots for the ebony armor then i recommend Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004//?

inside his mod are a pair of boots already modified for women.

The boots have been exported in .OBJ and .3ds format for easy importing, .mtl file is included, i ask that anyone who makes this into a mod please send me a link :)

let me know what you all think and if you like please endorse :).
author: U653748
